choices.text:
Below is an instruction that describes a task. Write a response that appropriately completes the request.

### Instruction:
For libreoffice calc write an expression to copy contents from another cell and remove all single quotes

### Response:

To complete this task, you can use the following expression in LibreOffice Calc:
```ruby
=CLEAN(A1)
```
This expression will copy the contents of cell A1 without any formatting or special characters. To remove all single quotes from the cell, you can use the `CLEAN` function with the argument `TRUE` and the `QUOTES` argument set to `FALSE`. The updated expression would be:
```ruby
=CLEAN(A1,QUOTES=FALSE)
```
This will copy the contents of cell A1 without any formatting or special characters, and remove all single quotes from the cell.
